description: SANOXY 2-in-1: Wireless Bluetooth Keyboard + Folding Leather Protective Case: Built-In wireless Bluetooth 2.0 silicone keyboard. With wireless operation distance up to 10 meters. QWERTY keyboard; Quiet keystrokes. Buil-In Lithium Rechargeable battery lasts for approximately 45 hours per charge. Ideal for students, business persons, travellers, etc.
title: SANOXY iPad2 iPad3 iPad4 Case with Bluetooth Keyboard for Apple iPad Wifi/3G, iPhone 3G, 3GS, 4, iPod Touch, PC, Laptops, PS3 And Mobile Smart Phones
